attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The smoking ban is in place, however it should be rethought of and should not penalise businesses that used to allow smoking within their premises (i.e. Pubs, Clubs).

The law should be rethought and allow landlords/owners of bars/clubs to have decision over whether smoking should be allowed within their premises or not.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
